nodes.text: The Marks of Illumination were symbols worn by Chalactan Adepts on their faces. The Lesser Mark was worn between the eyes by those who joined the Adepts, while the Greater Mark was worn above it by those deemed to have reached Chalactan Enlightenment. Chalactan Jedi Master Depa Billaba attained both marks, but removed her Greater Mark as a result of her experiences during the Summertime War on Haruun Kal.
